apple_vendor_description: This tender emoji on Apple devices captures a moment of affectionate connection between two individuals with distinct skin tones, a medium-dark and a medium-light. Their faces are angled towards each other, with closed eyes and soft, rosy cheeks, conveying a sense of intimacy and warmth, all rendered with Apple's signature smooth gradients and gentle 3D shading. The delicate curves and subtle highlights on their lips, as designed by Apple, emphasize the sweetness of the kiss, making it a beautiful way to express love, romance, or deep affection in messages shared on Apple devices.
